alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 10:30AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT AREAS SOUTH OF I-40 NEAR WINONA THROUGH 1100 AM MST... At 1029 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Walnut Canyon National Monument, or 15 miles southeast of Flagstaff, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pinegrove Campground, Ashurst Lake Campgrounds, and Upper Lake Mary. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Western Mogollon Rim
